content.full_text:
Data Management Plan – Paul DERMINE (Junior Postdoctoral Fellowship – 
Suspended until September 2023)
Name of the Project: The EU’s Recovery Plan and the Constitutional System of the European  
Union
Supervisor: Prof. Elise Muir (Faculty of Law)
The project will collect the following type of data: policy documents, and transcripts of semi-
structured interviews conducted with relevant stakeholders. Besides that, only publicly 
available documents will be used (legislation, case-law, scientific literature).
These data will be collected and stored in a digital format, on network-drives operated by the 
KULeuven. Back-ups will be automated, and the post-doctoral researcher will be the only 
person with access to the data.
For personal data, the necessary security measures (safe storage and strict access-policy) will 
be ensured.
The research will be submitted to the new integrated privacy rules (GDPR) and ethics checks 
of the KULeuven.
The personal responsible for this data will be my post-doctoral supervisor, Prof. Elise Muir.
